name: Dice'n'Sphere
description:
Made by magkaba and hzzzln for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Move: Arrow keys or WASD
Reset: R
Undo: U

If Input seems unresponsive, restart the level. It has something to do with the menu buttons.

Undo was a last minute addition and is quite buggy, sorry for that.

Song "Love They" by Loyalty Freak Music

https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

Song "Embrace" by Sappheiros
https://soundcloud.com/sappheirosmusic

"Casino Sounds" by Kenney (the GOAT)

https://kenney.nl/assets/casino-audio

Font "Monogram" by datagoblin

https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram

Thanks to our spouses for caring for the kids.
Thanks to our playtesters.
Thank you for playing!
